quit_confirmation: Are you sure you want to quit?
sign_with_finger: Please sign using your finger on the line below
review_form: Review this form below, and tap AGREE if you're ready to continue.
Find the blue dots on the next screen. T: Find the blue dots on the next screen. These are the targets dots.
Once ready, press 'start' and the target: Once ready, press 'start' and the target dots will turn grey and start moving.
Follow the target dots around the screen: Follow the target dots around the screen
Once the dots stop moving find and click: Once the dots stop moving find and click on the target dots and they will turn the original color.
You will see 9 tiles. An increasing numb: You will see 9 tiles. An increasing number of the tiles will be highlighted in order. When the light in the top of the screen is green, and reads 'go', you should press the blocks in the same order as they were highlighted.
Remember all the words you recall from t: Remember all the words you recall from the exercise earlier?
Write the words you recall in the boxes: Write the words you recall in the boxes and click
Each card has 5 arrows on it.
Swipe the cards in the direction of the: Swipe the cards in the direction of the middle arrow on each card.
Ignore all other arrows on the cards, th: Ignore all other arrows on the cards, they are only there to distract you
Then, tap the button on the next screen,: Then, tap the button on the next screen, whenever you hear the letter 'A' being said.
A screen with 6 tiles will appear. What: A screen with 6 tiles will appear. What is underneath each of them, will be revealed one by one. Click the tile matching the object in the middle, when the reveal is done.
button and the images will change positi: button and the images will change positions.
Drag and drop the images to their origin: Drag and drop the images to their original positions and press
Tap the button in the next window, whene: Tap the button in the next window, whenever all numbers in a given sequence has appeared on screen, in the given order. The numbers do not have to come in succession.
Tap the screen every time it turns from: Tap the screen every time it turns from red to green, as fast as possible.
was your final score. (Average reaction: was your final score. (Average reaction time in milliseconds)
Tap the color, of the word you see on sc: Tap the color, of the word you see on screen. E.g. tap the box that says 'green' when a green word appears
After a 3 second countdown, which will a: After a 3 second countdown, which will appear on screen, tap the two buttons as many times as possible with your index and middle finger, for
Connect the boxes to each other by drawi: Connect the boxes to each other by drawing lines between them in numerical order, starting at '1'.
Connect the boxes to each other by drawing lines between them.
You must alternate between letters and n: You must alternate between letters and numbers and should order them alphabetically and numerically, respectively.
Memorize the colors of the shapes.
Once ready the shapes will change positi: Once ready the shapes will change positions.
Indicate if ANY of the shapes changed co: Indicate if ANY of the shapes changed color or if ALL shapes remained the same
Turn on sound for this task.
A list of words will be read aloud, try: A list of words will be read aloud, try to memorize the list of words.
After the words have been read aloud you: After the words have been read aloud you will be asked to recall them.
Write the words you recall in the boxes: Write the words you recall in the boxes in any order and click
